headline: GE, IBD Stock Of The Day, Doubling Investments In U.S. Factories
summary: GE Aerospace is the IBD Stock Of The Day as it vows to invest nearly $1 billion in its U.S. factories and supply chain.  On Thursday, GE stock sought support near a buy point.  Announcing the investment on Wednesday, GE Aerospace stated that this investment nearly doubles last year's spending.

headline: Lockheed Martin's Arm Secures a Contract to Support Sonar Systems
summary: LMT's unit secures a $15.2 million modification contract to procure hardware for supporting sonar systems.
